function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Application of ai in covid-19 diagnosis and prediction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of blockchain technology for sar-cov-2 infectiousness using contact tracing","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cost analysis of wbe and clinical screening","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Complex model evaluation may lead to inaccuracies in covid-19 communities.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in wbe surveillance of water and wastewater concerning covid-19, including the non-existence of biomarkers discovery
